name: express-legacy-csp
description: Downgrade content-security-policy version and fidelity to support the requesting browser

scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.travis: npm test && npm run lint && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true)
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all -- mocha && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
